long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Podia ID Inspector is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that helps you quickly and easily extract product IDs from your Podia dashboard, essential for setting up Zapier automations. 

Instead of manually inspecting the browser, this extension allows you to copy the ID directly from next to the product title with a single click, making it perfect for non-developers and anyone looking to save time.
